== Compaq Presario R3360US ==

Global Machine Specs: Intel Pentium 4--3.0 GHz, 1024MB RAM, 15.4" 1280x800, Mobility Radeon 9100--128MB shared

=== Maverick Meerkat ===
Installed with live cd, tested from installed OS

==== Remarks ====
* Stock DVD-RW (HL-DT-ST GWA-4080N) fails live-cd booting 100% of the time.  Swapped with a Samsung SN-124 and installation completed successfully.
* System has been modded to have dual harddrives.  This was done by using a 2.5" IDE harddrive adapter, soldered onto the broken right USB port's headers and mounted in the floppy bay.
* hcn-001: To install wireless, system must be plugged into a wired connection, and use the Additional Drivers app to install b43-fwcutter, adding b43 to /etc/modules.  This only needs to be done once after installation.
* snr-002: Battery is 100% flat and will not hold a charge for more than 2-3 seconds. I was unable to test with AC disconnected for this reason.  Tests requiring removal of power failed almost immediately due to faulty battery.  Test 1 Failed, Test 3 passed, Test 6 passed (did not unplug AC power though), Test 7 passed
* him-001/him-002: When SD card is inserted, there is no activity light and nothing in dmesg.
